mapper.insert: insert into COUPON ( couponcode, couponname, discountkind, discountvalue, useminimum, discountmax, useyn, couponinfo, createuser, createdate) values ( #{couponcode}, #{couponname}, #{discountkind}, #{discountvalue}, #{useminimum}, #{discountmax}, #{useyn}, #{couponinfo}, #{createuser}, #{createdate} )

insert into COUPONTOMEMBER ( usercode, couponcode, couponno, createdate, createuser, reason, startdate, enddate, useyn, usemanager, usedate ) values ( #{usercode}, #{couponcode}, #{couponno}, #{createdate}, #{createuser}, #{reason}, #{startdate}, #{enddate}, #{useyn}, #{usemanager}, #{usedate} )
mapper.update: update COUPON set couponnamme = #{couponname}, discountkind = #{discountkind}, discountvalue = #{discountvalue}, useminimum = #{useminimum}, discountmax = #{discountmax}, useyn = #{useyn}, couponinfo = #{couponinfo} where couponcode = #{couponcode}
